import React from 'react' import './Header.css' import { Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useStateValue } from '../Hooks/StateProvider'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ShoppingBasket'; import RoomIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Room'; export default function Header() { const [state,] = useStateValue(); return (
Hello Select Your Address
All All Categories Deals Alexa skill Amazon Devices Amazon fashion Appliances Electronic car & motorbike clothing furniture Gifts & Gardens Video Games
) }
